column4: Hi :) I just installed Jaunty (love it! Apci works for me now :D ) But I managed to f*ck up my xp partition (human error) How do I add it to GRUB again? :)
> !grub
I didn't loose it after installing windows, I deleted XP by accident but managed to save it ( I think) :S
if u follow that guide it will fix grub for you
ahh your partition sty
sty?
sRy*
have a look at testdisk
ooh okay ;) Thanks :) I'm not even certain that I actually fixed it :S
I actually did it throug testdisk ;)
I saved the important files from my xp part, but I can't seem to make it "recover" all the files at all :S When I mount the drive it's empty except for "boot.ini" & "pagefile.sys"
what happend, what didi u do to mess it up ?

Yesterday late at night I tried to install Jaunty (beta) on my laptop but I managed to select my NTFS part instead of EXT3 part, I realized my error at about 12% and canceled immediately but to no avail :(
try photorec, it will recover most files that are left on the partition
Thanks :) So just use it and then??
you probably wont get it running with out reinstalling windows :/
Hmm fair :P I wanna try though >_< I'm simply to lazy to re-install windows. It's just such a hassle! Installing driver and downloading your favorite programs through their webpages >_<
winXP has some sort of auto recovery thing on the CD you might give it a try
Thanks, I'll give it a shot :) Other good advices? :)
BACKUP! ;)
Thanks ;) I actually learned that now :P Took a couple of careless years >_<
join the club hehe
Thanks! I will ;)
